contest-event.event-date:
July 28, 1894 D Nelson Contest
Nelson Contest 10 Other Nelson Contest nelson-contest
None
Bellini [arr. Round]
Football Field, Seed Hill, Nelson, Lancashire, England, UK Promoted by Nelson Prize Band 10 bands entered, 4 failed to turn up. Only 4 bands competed however. Besses and Wyke complained about the adjudicator and his alleged connection with Black Dyke, and could not be induced to compete and left the ground complaining of alleged partiality. Prizes: £20, £12, £8, 5
April 10, 2012, 7:03 p.m. June 14, 2019, 10:27 a.m.
1 Black Dyke Band John Gladney Jnr
2 Clayton le Moors Collinson Poole
3 Briercliffe Prize Brass Band John Gladney Jnr
4 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Harry Trickett
Withdrawn Besses o' th' Barn Unknown
